channel.title: CVE Feed for Artica PFMS -- Pandora FMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Artica PFMS -- Pandora FMS

item.title: CVE-2021-46681|2024-08-04T05:17:41.525Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: A XSS vulnerability exist in Pandora FMS version 756 and below, that allows an attacker to perform javascript code executions via module massive operation name field.

item.title: CVE-2021-46677|2024-08-04T05:17:41.591Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: A XSS vulnerability exist in Pandora FMS version 756 and below, that allows an attacker to perform javascript code executions via the event filter name field.

item.title: CVE-2021-46676|2024-08-04T05:17:41.586Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: A XSS vulnerability exist in Pandora FMS version 756 and below, that allows an attacker to perform javascript code executions via the transactional maps name field.

item.title: CVE-2021-46680|2024-08-04T05:17:41.797Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: A XSS vulnerability exist in Pandora FMS version 756 and below, that allows an attacker to perform javascript code executions via the module form name field.

item.title: CVE-2021-46679|2024-08-04T05:17:41.736Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: A XSS vulnerability exist in Pandora FMS version 756 and below, that allows an attacker to perform javascript code executions via service elements.

item.title: CVE-2021-46678|2024-08-04T05:17:41.628Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: A XSS vulnerability exist in Pandora FMS version 756 and below, that allows an attacker to perform javascript code executions via the service name field.
